title: 90% Results in 90 Days
summary: Measurable results in 90% of use cases within three months by targeting knowledge-intensive bottlenecks like patents and data architecture

content.whatItIs: Dai Nippon Printing (DNP), one of Japan's largest printing and information services companies, achieved what enterprise AI programs struggle to demonstrate: measurable results in 90% of use cases within three months of implementing ChatGPT Enterprise.
howItWorks: Breakthrough application: ICT R&D division automated patent research and filing strategies
Cut patent research time by 95% and expanded coverage 10x
Data architecture definition time cut by 90%—foundational improvement enabling faster downstream AI development
Identified high-value, knowledge-intensive workflows where AI could deliver immediate, measurable impact
Avoided broad, low-impact deployments in favor of targeted high-value applications
content.coreInsight: Target knowledge-intensive bottlenecks (patents, data architecture, research) for initial AI deployment rather than broad horizontal applications. Measure results in weeks, not years. The '90% in 90 days' benchmark sets a new standard for enterprise AI time-to-value.
content.keyMetrics: 90% of use cases showed measurable results within 3 months. Patent research: 95% time reduction, 10x coverage expansion. Data architecture: 90% time reduction.
